features: BEST OF KOREAN BEAUTY: We work with the finest Korean manufacturers to bring the best Korean skincare and beauty to you; infused with effective Korean ingredients and breakthrough formulas. Proudly Korean American Woman-Owned. Vegan, Cruelty-free, and Leaping Bunny approved. If you're not fully satisfied with your purchase, please contact us.

HYDRATION FOR HEALTHIER SKIN: A toner and serum combined into one formula, this hyaluronic face toner provides an easy and quick way to tone and hydrate skin for a smooth and luminous complexion. Featuring Antoxyl-S, a fermented Korean traditional grain extract, this active ingredient works as an antioxidant and helps to protect the skin from ozone and nitrogen dioxide (air pollution).

THOROUGHLY REMOVES DIRT: This is an effective toner for face that efficiently gets rid of dirt and impurities, without stripping your skin of its natural oils. It will greatly enhance your fresh skincare regimen.
GENTLE ON YOUR SKIN: We crafted a hydrating toner for face that’s refreshing and lightweight on the skin. Small amounts will go a long way in smoothening your skin - without the greasiness.
SUITS ALL SKIN TYPES: We formulated a hyaluronic acid toner that works on different skin types, so everyone can enrich their skin care routine to achieve a beautiful glow from within.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vitamin C Face Scrub Thank Me Later Matte Face Primer Thank Me Later Eye Primer It's So Big Volumizing Mascara Queen of the Fill Brow Gel More Must-Haves from Elizabeth Mott This refreshing face scrub is a cocktail of heat-activated technology, Vitamin C, and nourishing multivitamins for a radiant, healthy complexion. Get instant, mattifying results with a primer that brightens and balances skin tone. Keep eyeshadows vibrant and locked in with this oil-controlling, long lasting formula. Flexible tubing polymers coat each lash for max volume, while lightweight, natural waxes lift and hold curl. Unique Form-Filling Polymer Technology fills in sparse brows with lifelike hair texture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased it for my daughter, and she is very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: In the winter my skin (face) gets super dry and most creams on the market will leave my skin feeling sensitive after a few consecutive days of use. This product is fantastic! My skin is hydrated and no peel away dry skin! I use daily at night. It’s my go-to product when the dry cold season begins.

reviews.reviewText: This toner leaves my face clean and very hydrated. I love the fact that it is mot tested on animals. I have reordered several times and would highly recommend

reviews.reviewText: Me gusta la sensación de hidratación que deja en mi rostro!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing & Adds Hydration That Comforts My Dry & Sensitive Skin-Artificial Colorants & Fragrance
reviews.reviewText: This ﻿Elizabeth Mott Hydrating Toner is alcohol free and agrees well with my dry and sensitive skin. It has a watery gel consistency. I usually use my fingertips to apply it, but have used it on a cotton round if I feel like I have any residual makeup or grime to remove after cleansing. This never stings and has a gentle, refreshing and hydrating feel. It has good dry skin ingredients, such as sodium hyaluronate, butylene glycol, beta glucan, panthenol and Laminaria Japonica Extract. I still use a serum after this toner, but some may be able to simply follow with a moisturizer.This has Aspergillus Ferment mold extract that’s used for lightening and may help prevent hyperpigmentation over time. I’ve used this toner about a dozen times so I can’t yet judge if that’s a helpful addition. This does have artificial colorants and fragrance. While I find the scent light and pleasant, the fragrance ingredients are potential irritants and rate moderate to high health risk by EWG. This also has citric acid and geranium maculatum oil, which may also be irritants. I do have sensitive skin, however, and haven’t had any irritation. This toner feels refreshing and also adds hydration that makes my skin feel comfortable. Like it. 4 stars. Made in Korea.Ingredients: Water, Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Betaine, Glyceryl Glucoside, Sorghum Bicolor Leaf/Stem Extract, Aspergillus Ferment, Centella Asiatica Extract, Allium Cepa (Onion) Skin Extract, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Chlorphenesin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Panthenol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Beta-Glucan, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Laminaria Japonica Extract, Carbomer, Allantoin, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Arginine, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Fragrance, Linalool, Limonene, Geranium Maculatum Oil, Citronellol, CI 19140, CI 42090.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been using for over a year-Love It!
reviews.reviewText: I've used this product for over a year and a half. I have noticed a difference in my skin since using it. I struggle with hormonal acne, so moisture is needed but hard to maintain without making my skin worse. My skin is much more balanced and softer! I definitely recommend it!
